fields.name: BackendPort
fields.description: The port used for internal connections on the endpoint. Acceptable values are between 1 and 65535.

fields.name: FrontendPort
fields.description: The port for the external endpoint. Port numbers for each rule must be unique within the Load Balancer. Acceptable values are between 1 and 65534.

fields.name: ProbePort
fields.description: The prob port used by the load balancing rule. Acceptable values are between 1 and 65535.

fields.name: ProbeProtocol
fields.description: the reference to the load balancer probe used by the load balancing rule.

fields.name: ProbeRequestPath
fields.description: The probe request path. Only supported for HTTP/HTTPS probes.

fields.name: Protocol
fields.description: The reference to the transport protocol used by the load balancing rule.
